cast.original_title: 劇場版 NARUTO -ナルト- ブラッド・プリズン
cast.overview: After his capture for attempted assassination of the Raikage, leader of Kumogakure, as well as killing Jōnin from Kirigakure and Iwagakure, Naruto is imprisoned in Hōzukijou: A criminal containment facility known as the Blood Prison. Mui, the castle master, uses the ultimate imprisonment technique to steal power from the prisoners, which is when Naruto notices his life has been targeted. Thus begins the battle to uncover the truth behind the mysterious murders and prove Naruto's innocence.
cast.title: Naruto Shippuden the Movie: Blood Prison

details.biography:
Manabu Sakamaki (坂巻 学, Sakamaki Manabu, born July 6, 1982) is a Japanese voice actor from Saitama Prefecture. He belongs to Mausu Promotion. His hobbies and special skills include volleyball and memorizing things.

After graduating from Katsuta Voice Actor Academy (second batch) in 2006, he entered the training school attached to Mausu Promotion. He joined Mausu Promotion in 2008. His work includes TV anime, foreign film dubbing, and CD dramas.
details.name: Manabu Sakamaki
